entry.title: Friday night: Snow or freezing rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening then changing to freezing rain before morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain or freezing rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain in the morning and ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 60 near noon. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
